sent.orig: They raced to retrieve enemy rifles, cartridge belts, sack after sack of dripping flour and rice.
sent.trans: 他们争着捞出敌人的枪枝、子弹带，然后是一袋子一袋子叫水浸透了的面粉和大米。

sent.orig: Objective [WT6BZ]To study the clinical value of sandbag in sack hemorrhage of pacemaker implantation.
sent.trans: 目的为进一步探讨沙袋压迫对防止安装起搏器术后囊袋出血的价值。

sent.orig: Old foreign-policy hands argue that it is foolish to appoint somebody you cannot sack.
sent.trans: 一些资深外交人士认为，任命无法驾驭的人是愚蠢的。

sent.orig: Objective To explore the effect of Anti-flu Sack on immunity in mice.
sent.trans: 目的观察防感袋对小鼠免疫功能的影响。

sent.orig: A bag or sack used diplomatic dispatches.
sent.trans: 用来制作袋子或麻布袋的粗糙纤维。
